description.title: Letterboxd 500 most watched movies of all time
subtitle: As of: December 21st, 2025
Seen: 57%
Hope you all enjoy and let me know if a movie is missing :)
* Barbie is #1 with 6,37M views
* Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides is #500 with 1,256M views
Monthly changes:
* Frankenstein (#376) and Heat (#494) are new on this list. Room and The Florida Project are out

* One Battle After Another (+102), The Fantastic Four: First Steps (+36), KPop Demon Hunters (+27), Now You See Me (+24), Weapons (+19) and Wicked (+16) gained the most spots. Moonrise Kingdom (-9), The Banshees of Inisherin (-9), The Royal Tenenbaums (-9), Marriage Story (-8) and The Whale (-8) lost the most
Movies that are close to an entrance:
* Dirty Dancing (1,255M views)
* Portrait of a Lady on Fire (1,250M views)
* Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1,246M views)
* The French Dispatch (1,243M views)
* The Florida Project (1,242M views)
Trending movies that will sooner or later be in this list:
* Materialists (1,185M views)
* Wicked: For Good (1,001M views)
* Wake Up Dead Man (931K views)
* Bugonia (880K views)
* Zootopia 2 (576K views)
* Avatar: Fire and Ash (215K views)
